1.1.name: wordpress/per-page-force-ssl
1.1.description:
This plugin will allow you to force an ssl(HTTPS) on a per page basis by adding the "force_ssl" custom field. It will jump back out of the SSL connection on other pages if it doesn't detect the custom field so that you can continue to use a standard http connection.

See the FAQ for a list of commonly occuring issues and their fixes.
